Package net.sim

Class Simulation

java.lang.Object
net.sim.Simulation
public class Simulation extends Object
This class is a superstructure for the simulation It handles requests the user can make in terms of interacting with the simulation/network It contains all the components necessary to represent a network topology It has all methods necessary for creating a topology
Author:
Martin Janda

    • addConnection

      public void addConnection(Device device1, Device device2, ConnectionType connectionType)
      Add a connection to the simulation Creates a Connection using ConnectionFactory and adds it to Connections
      Parameters:
      device1 - Reference to one of the devices being connected
      device2 - Reference to the other device being connected
      connectionType - Type of connection to be created, see ConnectionType

    • getNewConnectionID

      public int getNewConnectionID()
      Returns an integer for a new and unique connectionID Increments connectionIDIncrement to keep track of ID's that have already been used

      Parameters:

      chance - Chance between 0-1 that the connection fails
